channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: About
item.description: Q: What's all this, then? If It Stops, I'm Having a Bad Dream is a blog intended to serve as one node of opinion and analysis in the context. We come to you on demand through your fibre-optic cable -- capital's Q: Is this site run by post-modern neo-Marxists? Yes. Q: What's with the old-timey site, gramps? Revolutionary new technologies, and especially media technologies, simultaneously possess an empancipatory as well as oppressive potentiality.
